context: Hi! I'm looking for a movie about a sports team
I really liked Hoosiers (1986) , but it doesn't have to be about basketball. I haven't seen The Blind Side (2009) . I'll have to check it out. Any other suggestions? Any sport will work.
I haven't seen that, either. Can you tell me something about it?
A football coach befriends a mentally challenged young man in Radio (2003)
Ah. So if I like Friday Night Lights (2004) , I might like that.
resp: Sort of. You ever seen Clash of the Titans (1981)
